summary: The Growing University AI Research for Defense Act aims to authorize the Secretary of Defense to establish a National Security and Defense Artificial Intelligence Institute. This institute will foster research, development, and workforce training related to AI for national security purposes. It will involve partnerships between public and private organizations, and provide financial assistance to eligible host institutions to support activities like data management, testbed development, research, and outreach. Financial assistance is awarded for five-year periods and must be merit-based. The Act restricts the funding to entities within the United States.
